### DIBuilder() {#ac8ac7630f0db651689bd561d7ab07ba3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DIBuilder::DIBuilder (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, bool AllowUnresolved=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dicompileunit">DICompileUnit</a> &#42; CU=nullptr)</>}

Construct a builder for a module.

If <code>AllowUnresolved</code>, collect unresolved nodes attached to the module in order to resolve cycles during <em><a href="#a138b93205c71960aa94763a1081c50e9">finalize()</a></em>.

If <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a></code> is given a value other than nullptr, then set <code>CUNode</code> to <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a>.

### createAutoVariable() {#ae6081972b0560d0f16bd503654924b1b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DILocalVariable &#42; DIBuilder::createAutoVariable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a> &#42; Scope, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/difile">DIFile</a> &#42; File, unsigned LineNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ditype">DIType</a> &#42; Ty, bool AlwaysPreserve=false, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dinode/#aded082f50ef7ec8cbcd27f2b0dec28a9">DINode::DIFlags</a> Flags=DINode::FlagZero, uint32&#95;t AlignInBits=0)</>}>
Create a new descriptor for an auto variable.

This is a local variable that is not a subprogram parameter.

<code>Scope</code> must be a <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocalscope">DILocalScope</a></em>, and thus its scope chain eventually leads to a <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubprogram">DISubprogram</a></em>.

If <code>AlwaysPreserve</code>, this variable will be referenced from its containing subprogram, and will survive some optimizations.

### createParameterVariable() {#afa7c4efcb5c40c8527c13759f10ef5ed}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DILocalVariable &#42; DIBuilder::createParameterVariable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a> &#42; Scope, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, unsigned ArgNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/difile">DIFile</a> &#42; File, unsigned LineNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ditype">DIType</a> &#42; Ty, bool AlwaysPreserve=false, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dinode/#aded082f50ef7ec8cbcd27f2b0dec28a9">DINode::DIFlags</a> Flags=DINode::FlagZero, DINodeArray Annotations=nullptr)</>}>
Create a new descriptor for a parameter variable.

<code>Scope</code> must be a <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocalscope">DILocalScope</a></em>, and thus its scope chain eventually leads to a <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubprogram">DISubprogram</a></em>.

<code>ArgNo</code> is the index (starting from <code>1</code>) of this variable in the subprogram parameters. <code>ArgNo</code> should not conflict with other parameters of the same subprogram.

If <code>AlwaysPreserve</code>, this variable will be referenced from its containing subprogram, and will survive some optimizations.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/dibuilder-h/#l00758">758</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/dibuilder-h">DIBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/dibuilder-cpp/#l00825">825</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/dibuilder-cpp">DIBuilder.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Replace arrays on a composite type.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Replace a temporary node.

Call <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a2e9fe39301fbac7276c8d9f3e1884dc2">MDNode::replaceAllUsesWith()</a></em> on <code>N</code>, replacing it with <code>Replacement</code>.

If <code>Replacement</code> is the same as <code>N.get()</code>, instead call <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#af8e7c85da0c37b1a8a5099d7a01f03a8">MDNode::replaceWithUniqued()</a></em>. In this case, the uniqued node could have a different address, so we return the final address.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/dibuilder-h/#l01025">1025</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/dibuilder-h">DIBuilder.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### replaceVTableHolder() {#a736aced5bb739ef4976f57e0bc58ae22}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DIBuilder::replaceVTableHolder (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dicompositetype">DICompositeType</a> &#42;&amp; T, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ditype">DIType</a> &#42; VTableHolder)</>}>
Replace the vtable holder in the given type.

If this creates a self reference, it may orphan some unresolved cycles in the operands of <code>T</code>, so <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dibuilder">DIBuilder</a></em> needs to track that.
